definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Its function in education was to enhance the literacy education.
sentences.chinese: 新民团组织的教育功能主要是开展识字教学。

sentences.english: Deaf school, HanShan teach children literacy dancing.
sentences.chinese: 聋哑学校，韩珊教孩子们识字跳舞。

sentences.english: Why should you turn over the pages of my book?
sentences.chinese: 清风不识字，何必乱翻书？
“识字阅读的方式再不断进化，”她告诉我。

sentences.english: We are fond of reading but there are still illiterates they must be consent to banning the book.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱读书，还有不识字的人呢，他们准赞成禁书。

sentences.english: World recognition refers to the process of perceiving how written symbols correspond to one's spoken language.
sentences.chinese: 识字是指意识到书面符号如何对应其口说语言的过程。

sentences.english: Being parents, you should educate your son not to run amuck.
sentences.chinese: 来帮助社会上不识字的人们。

sentences.english: Such model of education deserves close study in the history of education.
sentences.chinese: 新民团的识字教学模式及其成绩在教育史上值得研究。

sentences.english: Your children should be literate and numerate.
sentences.chinese: 你的孩子应该会识字算数。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean had undertaken to teach her to read.
The liberation of the early part of the Organization of illiteracy among rural women form a "literacy class."
sentences.chinese: 解放初期，农村组织部分文盲妇女组成“识字班”。

sentences.english: Despite this, in many developing countries, the literacy rate for women is abysmal .
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，许多发展中国家的妇女识字率却令人叹息。

sentences.english: Although my grandmother was illiterate, she had a good stack of myths and legends.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖母不识字，可是她有一箩筐的神话和传奇故事。

sentences.english: That no good. Ugh. Him make Indians learn read.
sentences.chinese: 这可不好，哦，她让印第安人学会识字。

sentences.english: Use the Rotary Club of Kano's example to assist in designing Literacy and Microenterprise projects.
sentences.chinese: 请利用卡诺扶轮社为范本来规划识字与小型企业计划。

sentences.english: Only a few of the nation's peasants are literate.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的农民中只有少数人能识字。

definition: to know how to count and do sums/numerate/numeracy
lit. the eye cannot recognize the letter T (idiom); totally illiterate
Three Character Classic, 13th century reading primer consisting of Confucian tenets in lines of 3 characters
new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
to read a book/to study/to attend school
